project.projectDescription:
Web scraped data of 10k Play Store apps for analyzing the Android market. It has the data of apps’ category, rating, reviews etc. So, these data can help get the understanding of people’s use and opinion of apps and know more about the app market based on different categories.
In order to see the relationship between social category and shopping category, we only review the data of these two categories. So A random sample of 257 of apps is taken from the overall dataset. We are interested in estimating if the app rating varies by the app category of social and shopping.
project.dataDescription:
The data set describes each app’s statistics and their rating and received reviews.
To clean up the data and reduce the size to be manageable for this project, we extracted only apps who belong to social category and shopping category. For this project, we extracted the columns of app, category and rating.
project.researchQuestion: RQ: Do app rating varies by the app category of social and shopping（alpha = 0.05）
project.conclusion: Since 2.442 less than 3.878184. So we do not have significant evidence at the alpha = 0.05 that there is a different in rating and app categories of social and shopping. Therefore, app rating does not vary by the app category of social and shopping.
